entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
